content.raw:
My system now requires ROS_IP, otherwise Val collapses. Fought with it for a few days and just now remembered this issue so tried setting ROS_IP and she stands.* Still having problems with the controller not accepting subscriptions that were accepted previously.* This was fixed by getting the ROS_IP setting on all terminals. 

I think this is related to a system software kernel upgrade from 3.16.0-77 to 4.4.0-51 that took place last Wednesday night. Hard to say, of course.
content.html:
My system now requires ROS_IP, otherwise Val collapses. Fought with it for a few days and just now remembered this issue so tried setting ROS_IP and she stands. Still having problems with the controller not accepting subscriptions that were accepted previously. This was fixed by getting the ROS_IP setting on all terminals.

I think this is related to a system software kernel upgrade from 3.16.0-77 to 4.4.0-51 that took place last Wednesday night. Hard to say, of course.
